name: Santa's Helper (cubecrafter360)
description:
Santa and his helper are trying to deliver all his presents for Christmas eve but they are struggling because of fireplaces being turned on in multiple houses. You will have to work together to deliver all the presents.

How to play

The game is played in split-screen and 2 teams cooperate to deliver Christmas presents. Team 1 is flying the sleigh and needs to drop presents at all the highlighted houses if the fireplace is on(the house is smoking) in that house he can't deliver a present before team 2 has turned off the fireplace. Team 2 is playing on the ground and has to go to all the highlighted houses and turn them off so team 1 can deliver presents 

The game is split-screen and consists of 2 teams. Team 1 is in the air delivering gifts to all the highlighted houses.  and team 2 is turning off the fireplaces in the highlighted houses so Santa can deliver the presents.

Work together to save Christmas!

Controls

Air Crew (Team 1)

  • Arrow keys for movement
  • Right CTRL for dropping presents

Ground crew (Team 2)

  • WASD + mouse for movement
  • Q for turning off fireplaces 

Hope you will like the game and share it :)
